data.collegeAbout:
Sharda University, established in 2009, is a renowned private university located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh. The university is accredited with a Grade A+ by NAAC and recognized by the UGC. Sharda University is ranked among the top 4% of universities in Asia for the year 2024 as per QS Rankings. According to NIRF 2024, Sharda University has been ranked 86th (Overall) and 69th (Pharmacy). It has academic tie-ups with 250+ Universities worldwide from countries such as the USA, UK, Russia, Slovenia, Italy, Canada, and many more.

Sharda University offers 130+ Programs at UG, PG and Doctoral levels under its 14 Schools in various disciplines. B.Tech, MBA and M.Tech are the flagship courses offered at Sharda University. The university conducts its entrance, Sharda University Admission Test (SUAT), for admission to all major courses. The university also accepts national tests such as JEE, CLAT, CAT, MAT, XAT, NATA, and NEET.

Sharda University has 17,000+ students enrolled in different programs with 900+ highly qualified faculty. Sharda University also offers up to 100% scholarships based on merit in the Sharda University Scholastic Aptitude Test (SUSAT). The university also offers scholarship facilities for international students. Sharda University has an impressive placement record with 100% placements for MBA, 91% placements for the B.Tech, and 92% placement offers for Media, Film and Production courses during its 2024 placement drive. More than 600 companies visited the campus during the recruitment drive and the highest package stood at INR 40 LPA at Sharda University Placements 2024. Amazon, Cognizant, NTT Data, Tech Mahindra, Audi, Atos, Cafe Coffee Day are among the top recruiters at Sharda University.

courses.courseAbout:
The Top BTech colleges in India include IIT Madras, IIT Delhi, IIT Bombay, IIT Kanpur, IIT Roorkee, IIT Kharagpur, IIT Hyderabad, IIT Guwahati, NIT Trichy, and VIT Vellore, per NIRF Engineering ranking 2023. BTech Admissions are based on BTech entrance exams such as JEE Main, JEE Advanced, BITSAT, VITEEE, SRMJEEE followed by a GD/ PI round. The fee structure ranges from INR 20,000 to INR 20,00,000, while the average package ranges from INR 6 to INR 30 LPA. The salaries of graduates from prestigious BTech colleges like IITs, NITs, and some private institutes have experienced a significant increase in the range of 2 to 25 per cent. IIT Madras recorded the highest package, INR 1.31 crore per annum, per 2023 final placement reports.

The Top BTech Colleges in India from IIT Madras to IIT Bombay are actively working on their BTech curriculum to offer more hands-on experience for Btech students. Jadavpur University is the top BTech college in India with low fees, which is between INR 9,000 - INR 1,20,000 with an average package of INR 11.08 LPA.

Contact Us Now

The weightage assigned to each parameter is shown in the graph given below:

  • IIT Madras is the best BTech college in India, per NIRF Ranking 2023. It is ranked at 1 with an 89.89 NIRF score.
  • The rankings of IIT Delhi, IIT Bombay, and IIT Kanpur remain unchanged. However, IIT Roorkee has shown improvement and it has overtaken IIT Kharagpur.
  • IIT Guwahati has maintained its position at 7th. It is followed by IIT Hyderabad which has overtaken IIT Tiruchirappalli and has achieved +1.
  • Jadavpur University Kolkata has managed to secure a place in the list of top 10 Engineering colleges in India this year. It is followed by VIT Vellore at 11 with a NIRF score of 66.59
  • IIT Varanasi has seen a fall in its ranking this year. It has dropped to 15 from 13. It is followed by NIT Rourkela and IIT ISM Dhanbad at 16th and 17th place.

data.collegeAbout:
Amity University Noida offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses in fields like Management, Engineering, Design, Architecture, Fine Arts, Journalism, Sciences, Commerce, etc. The university also offers Ph.D., Evening, Lateral Entry, Polytechnic, Online & Distance Learning courses. To apply for various courses at Amity Noida, candidates must satisfy the minimum eligibility criteria prescribed by the institute. Amity University also offers 3 continent programs under which students can learn from the best practical applications across three different economies. Amity University Noida is ranked “31” for Engineering and “28” for Management courses by NIRF Rankings 2023.

One of the flagship course of Amity Noida is MBA and the candidate must be ready to pay a fee of INR 15.56 Lakhs. However, candidates who wish to pursue MCA, need to pay a fee of INR 5.20 Lakhs
